verses.verse: The earth<WH776> is Yahweh<WH3068>'s, with its fullness;<WH4393> the world,<WH8398> and those who dwell therein.<WH3427>
For he has founded<WH3245> it on the seas,<WH3220> and established<WH3559> it on the floods.<WH5104>
Who may ascend<WH5927> to Yahweh<WH3068>'s hill?<WH2022> Who may stand<WH6965> in his holy<WH6944> place?<WH4725>
He who has clean<WH5355> hands<WH3709> and a pure<WH1249> heart;<WH3824> who has not lifted up<WH5375> his soul<WH5315> to falsehood,<WH7723> and has not sworn<WH7650> deceitfully.<WH4820>
He shall receive<WH5375> a blessing<WH1293> from Yahweh,<WH3068> righteousness<WH6666> from the God<WH430> of his salvation.<WH3468>
This is the generation<WH1755> of those who seek<WH1875> Him,<WH1245> who seek your face<WH6440>â€”even Jacob.<WH3290> Selah.<WH5542>
Lift up<WH5375> your heads,<WH7218> you gates!<WH8179> Be lifted up,<WH5375> you everlasting<WH5769> doors,<WH8179> and the King<WH4428> of glory<WH3519> will come in.<WH935>
Who is the King<WH4428> of glory?<WH3519> Yahweh<WH3068> strong<WH5808> and mighty,<WH1368> Yahweh<WH3068> mighty<WH1368> in battle.<WH4421>
Lift up<WH5375> your heads,<WH7218> you gates;<WH8179> yes,<WH5375> lift them up, you everlasting<WH5769> doors,<WH6607> and the King<WH4428> of glory<WH3519> will come in.<WH935>
Who is this King<WH4428> of glory?<WH3519> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> is the King<WH4428> of glory!<WH3519> Selah.<WH5542>
